#summary Usage help showing all command-line arguments.
#labels Featured

{{{
usage: mpssh.py [-h] -f FILE [-d MSEC] [-e] [-E] [-p NPROC] [-u USER]
                [-l CHARS] [-S SSHBIN] [-O SSHOPT] [-H] [-v] [-D] [-V]
                command

Executes an SSH command simulatenously on many hosts.

positional arguments:
  command               SSH command to mass-execute

optional arguments:
  -h, --help            show this help message and exit
  -f FILE, --file FILE  name of the file with the list of hosts (default:
                        None)
  -d MSEC, --delay MSEC
                        delay between each SSH fork (default: 50)
  -e, --zeroexit        print also zero remote command exit codes (default:
                        False)
  -E, --ignexit         ignore non-zero remote command exit codes (default:
                        False)
  -p NPROC, --procs NPROC
                        number of parallel SSH processes (default: 100)
  -u USER, --user USER  force SSH login as this username (default: use current
                        user)
  -l CHARS, --maxlen CHARS
                        maximum length of output lines (default: 80)
  -S SSHBIN, --sshbin SSHBIN
                        SSH binary path (default: /usr/bin/ssh)
  -O SSHOPT, --sshopt SSHOPT
                        additional options to pass to SSH; may be specified
                        many times; skip the leading dash (default: ['o
                        NumberOfPasswordPrompts=0'])
  -H, --noheader        do not show the header info (default: False)
  -v, --verbose         be more verbose (default: False)
  -D, --debug           show debug traces (default: False)
  -V, --version         show program's version number and exit
}}}
